title: Sky Cloud
description: SaaS website for a cloud storage service built with React & TailwindCSS, following a specific and unique design theme.

title: Space Rise
description: A spaceflight news web app that leverages the Spaceflight News API with React & TailwindCSS for getting quick news related to spaceflights.

title: Memoir
description: Minimalistic note-taking app integrated with Firebase for account management, data backup and various other features.

title: Holo Movies
description: Modern movie database discovery web app built with React and uses OMDb API for fetching movies and their details.
